game_description: Navigate around a large open space where you can observe how we load the different level of details based on the position of the player. You can Navigate using 3 modes (Switch using the B button on the remote) Teleport: Point your controller and Press A to show the target position Walk: Glide around on the ground using the joysticks and the direction of your head Free: Move around using the joystick and the direction of your head. In this mode you can fly around. Toggle the Settings menu by pressing Y Different settings are available for you to see explore the loading system.
